name: louisianan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Louisiana: Louisianans call Hurricane Katrina simply "the storm". Any Louisianian who wants his kids to have a religious education can send them to faith schools.
More examplesFewer examplesThis is very welcome news for the thousands of Louisianans.I'm not a North Carolinian; I'm a Louisianian.Generations of Louisianans will forever benefit from coach Robinson's fight for equality.

belonging or relating to the US state of Louisiana or its people: She has a Mexican mother and Louisianan father. He speaks a distinctly Louisianan Creole.
More examplesFewer examplesThe most important sector of the Louisianan economy is fossil fuels extraction. Louisianan cane is usually cut before it reaches full maturity.The issue of slavery permeated Louisianian politics at the turn of the century.
